name: Jabber Test Suite (JabberTest)
short_description: JabberTest is a GPL'd testing harness for Jabber to test performance and delivery. The software includes several tools to perform various tests, including timing of account creation, message delivery, and concurrent session limits.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
